bill_title: revise provisions regarding lottery winner confidentiality.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise provisions regarding lottery winner confidentiality. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 42-7A be amended by adding a NEW SECTION to read: Any person who is a prize winner of a lottery prize in an amount equal to fifty thousand and one dollar or more, may choose to remain anonymous. If the prize winner chooses to remain anonymous, the commission may not publicly disclose the name, city, state of residence, or other identifying information of the prize winner. 100 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.167 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
